column4: Could not load the Host USB Proxy Service (VERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND). The service might be not installed on the host computer.a  using ubuntu, virtualbox

- are you using ubuntu as your host os? also if you installed virtual box from ubuntu's repo's then usb support is unfortunately disabled. You may choose to download and install the non free version from innoteks site instead
yes. i use puel on ubuntu.
